class.name: SpriteFrames
class.brief_description: Sprite frame library for AnimatedSprite2D and AnimatedSprite3D.
class.description: Sprite frame library for an [AnimatedSprite2D] or [AnimatedSprite3D] node. Contains frames and animation data for playback. [b]Note:[/b] You can associate a set of normal or specular maps by creating additional [SpriteFrames] resources with a [code]_normal[/code] or [code]_specular[/code] suffix. For example, having 3 [SpriteFrames] resources [code]run[/code], [code]run_normal[/code], and [code]run_specular[/code] will make it so the [code]run[/code] animation uses normal and specular maps.

method.name: add_animation
method.description: Adds a new animation to the library.

method.name: add_frame
method.description: Adds a frame to the given animation.

method.name: clear
method.description: Removes all frames from the given animation.

method.name: clear_all
method.description: Removes all animations. A "default" animation will be created.

method.name: get_animation_loop
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the given animation is configured to loop when it finishes playing. Otherwise, returns [code]false[/code].

method.name: get_animation_names
method.description: Returns an array containing the names associated to each animation. Values are placed in alphabetical order.

method.name: get_animation_speed
method.description: The animation's speed in frames per second.

method.name: get_frame_count
method.description: Returns the number of frames in the animation.

method.name: set_animation_speed
method.description: The animation's speed in frames per second.

method.name: set_frame
method.description: Sets the texture of the given frame.

members.member: Compatibility property, always equals to an empty array.
